我都想請教下”屋企點解用wifi,出街要用data”
假設用無限數據 速度為800 Mbps 家居係新界村屋8Mbps 咁屋企點解要用WiFi ?
假設係有限速數據368Kbps 出街公共256-bit加密WiFi有2Mbps AP同AP之間做到overlap WiFi之間連線唔會斷 咁出街點解要用data ?

replies.msg:
你要用common sense去諗，你出街真係唔洗用data? Public hotspot 真係做到全面覆蓋？答案係唔得，第一樣已經睇到用wifi個coverage相對較少。

當然，如果用最top最新（generation, transmission speed) 嘅broadband同最垃圾嘅wifi比（standard 802.11a/b)咁緊係data好過wifi, 但值得討論嘅係講緊一般情況，正如你唔會拎band2嘅最top嘅學生用band1嘅最垃圾比較，然後話band2>band1

咁一般而言 wifi嘅 transmission相對上快d，但安全性同coverage就係佢嘅缺點

quote.msg:
認真睇下本書都答到好多問題啦
利申：考前望下都有4 仲要係elective D

replies.msg: 其實elective D係會高分過其他

其實大部分topic 攞分不難，好似Programming module 真係易執分架，下下都問compiler vs interpreter, linker, waterfall, rich programming library adv/modularity adv, oop vs procedural, binary search vs linear search, 識下software developers title

呢科唔值得擺太多時間，考既content 簡單得滯

Mc 來來去去都係2’s complement, check digit, compress 完既jpg, pdf再壓無用，html, txt 都係text, top level domain, vpn encryption
router function
ssd, ftp, http, https, imap, pop3
“hkdse5” 個5 都係string 咁store 既size
member id 用10 bytes store, name 用50 bytes store，最多儲幾多records 呢啲野
SQL 識select where 就夠
Captcha 既形式, image, sound, user interaction analysis (呢樣你平時見到剩係手指劃動就驗證到u are human 有無諗過點解呢）
Tablet, smartphone, smart speaker (HomePod, echo) 等有乜design 上考慮
Streaming
Access point, tethering
CPU (Lau, cu), ram, motherboard 呢幾樣野好似好少考了

再加每樣野既比較，好處壞處，size 比較或計size
bmp vs jpg vs gif vs png, e.g. calculate size, which are vector graphics? Lossless compression? 等
Avi vs mp4
Wav vs mp3
Router vs switch vs hub
PDF vs word
css vs js
Server side vs client side validation
WiFi vs 3G/4G vs Bluetooth vs Internet connection (include WiFi standard 802.11x)
Raid, defragmentation program
Face ID vs Touch ID vs password (ICT 問呢啲野係書未必有得溫，但係你識係make sense, 你阿sir 都應該要教）

上面每個term 都諗下幾時用同點解咁用，其實問得都好多時係日常生活既野，DSE 係連點解要update xxx software, e.g. antivirus 都問架
好似xxx suggest using pdf instead of word doc, give 2 reasons
Give 2 situations u’ll use Bluetooth instead

仲有未必簡單comparison 可能要轉少少彎
我段片想長度一樣，但我想個file size 少啲，要點做
我個webpage 多圖load 得慢，要點做

知道上面堆重點已經5 架啦

WIFI一定係冇咁安全
